title: How do I download the Alpha Beta Client again?
body: So I messed up my league of legends today by accident. It stopped opening so I decided to uninstall it and reinstall it but It popped up as the legacy client. How do I install the alpha beta client? I press on the upgrade now tab on the legacy client but all it shows is a youtube video? Can someone guide me to on how to redownload the Alpha Beta Client?

replies.body:
The way you install the Beta Client is to hit that upgrade button. You may need to delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file inside your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) then launch your League Client again from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file to try the upgrade again. You may need to try this a few times before it works.

Let me know if this worked!
Thanks a lot it helped me really i wasnt able to start client for weeks thank you a lot :)
league will not launch after last upgrade, so how do I upgrade?
